name: Nordic Shooting
description:
Nordic Shooting is Turn-based First Person Shooter for 2 players.

Shoot your friend in the knee to end his adventures!

Every time your turn ends, the enemy island rotates, so you need to hide carefully .

You need a real friend to play this game in hot seat mode.

We created the game in 48 hours during Slavic Game Jam 2018.
